feature: Simplified Waiting List for a Todo App Landing Page

featureSchema.name: Simplified Waiting List Landing Page
featureSchema.description: A straightforward landing page designed to engage users and build anticipation for the launch of the Todo app. It features a warm welcome message, a compelling waiting list invitation, and a simple email input field for registration.
featureSchema.userStory: As a potential user, I want to join a waiting list through a simple and clear landing page, so that I can be notified when the Todo app is launched and not miss out on early access.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria:
1. The landing page must display a clear welcome message and an invitation message to join the waiting list.
2. There should be an input field labeled 'Enter your email to join the waiting list:' for users to enter their email addresses.
3. A prominent 'Join Now' button must be present to submit the registration.
4. The page should provide basic error handling for invalid email formats and confirmations upon successful submission.
featureSchema.diagram: A simple layout diagram: Top section contains the welcome message, followed by the waiting list invitation text. Below this is the email input field and 'Join Now' button, all centered on the page.
featureSchema.additional: This feature focuses on minimalism and clarity. The design is intended to be engaging yet not overwhelming, ensuring ease of use and encouraging sign-ups.
featureSchema.prompt: Create an HTML landing page featuring a welcome message for the Todo app with a clear call-to-action for joining a waiting list. The page should include a welcoming header, a text block explaining the waiting list benefits, an input field for an email address with the label 'Enter your email to join the waiting list:', and a prominent 'Join Now' button. Ensure basic email validation and user feedback on submission. The design should be responsive and minimalistic.
featureSchema.code:
Welcome to TodoApp!

Your journey to better task management starts here.

Join our waiting list to be the first to know when we launch! Exciting features await you.
featureSchema.notes: This feature is designed to be simple and is aimed at gathering early interest for the app launch. Additional functionalities like backend integration and more advanced UI/UX improvements can be added later based on user feedback.
